rampart; base (in baseball); to build with stones, bricks etc

rtega_mnemonic:
壘壘RS
垒垒		塁rampart, military wall, base
  • dike between fields 畾 made of ground 土
  • ⓢ many individuals 厽 defending their ground 土 on a rampart
  • modf. 壘 → 塁

  • four places 土 on the field 田 marked by 丿 in baseball: base
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 垒)
Pictophonetic: 畾 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 畾 [ léi ] fields divided by dikes
    • 土 [ tǔ ] soil, earth; items made of earth
heisig_chinese_memo: The think tank comes up with an idea to make baseball bases filled with soil so it doesn't hurt when a player dives into one. The think tank struggles with ideas too ya know!
Ru_trainchinese: lěi: (глаг/сущ) насыпать, возводить, громоздить; вал; база (в бейсболе или софтболе)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This looks like a baseball diamond with the four elbows being the baseball bases and the soil being home base.
humanum_short_description_en:
Inscriptions from the fourth " field " from " soil " as a name, meaning unknown, so thirteen years □ Yang Ge: "The workers Za (division) Kitamiya base, the rule of yellow."

Later " base " refers to the barracks wall or used as a defense against an enemy, such as barriers, the two armies confront each other, "said the text": ".. Base, the military wall from the soil Lei also sound."
humanum_short_description:
金文從四「田」，從「土」，用作人名，意義不詳，十三年□陽令戈：「工帀(師)北宮壘，冶黃。」

　　後來「壘」指軍營中用作禦敵或防守的牆壁，如壁壘，兩軍對壘，《說文》：「壘，軍壁也。从土畾聲。」

壘字的基本解释

壘
lěi
见“垒”。

壘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lěi］
［《廣韻》力軌切，上旨，來。］
“垒2”的繁体字。亦作“蘲1”。
(1)军壁，阵地上的防御工事。
(2)指军营。
(3)堆砌。
(4)山岳；土堆。
(5)竖立。
(6)巢；窝。
(7)星座名。即垒壁阵。
(8)姓。《後赵录》有壘澄，本姓裴。见《广韵·上旨》。
[②]［léi］
［《集韻》倫追切，平脂，來。］
“垒3”的繁体字。
(1)巨大。
(2)重叠累积的样子。参见“壘2壘”。
(3)通“累”。捆绑。
[③]［lèi］
［《集韻》盧對切，去隊，來。］
“垒4”的繁体字。
见“壘3石”。
[④]［lǜ］
［《集韻》劣戌切，入術，來。］
“垒5”的繁体字。
见“鬱壘”。

壘字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　壘； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页241第24
【廣韻】力軌切【集韻】【韻會】魯水切，?音藟。【說文】軍壘也。【禮·曲禮】四郊多壘，卿大夫之辱也。【周禮·夏官】量人掌營軍之壘舍，量其市朝州涂軍社之所里。　又星名。【史記·天官書】虛南衆星曰羽林天軍，軍西爲壘。　又官名。【前漢·百官公卿表】武帝平南越，內增七校，中壘其一也。　又姓，後趙壘澄，晋梓潼太守壘錫。　又【集韻】艮斐切。山貌。　又倫追切，音纍。畏壘，山名。【莊子·庚桑楚】北居畏壘之山。又玉壘山，在灌縣西，唐貞觀閒設關于其下。【岑參詩】玉壘天晴望，諸峰盡覺低。　又重也。一曰壯貌。【前漢·鮑宣傳】魁壘之士。　又冢相次也。【張載·七哀】北邙何壘壘。　又與累同。【荀子·大略篇】不憂其係壘也。　又與礌同。【前漢·李陵傳】下壘石。　又【廣韻】呂䘏切【集韻】【韻會】列戌切，?音律。鬱壘，神名。【風俗通】上古有神荼，鬱壘兄弟二人，在東海度朔山桃樹下，?閱百鬼，其不循理者，持以葦索，執以飼虎。【張衡·東京賦】度朔作梗，守以鬱壘。神荼副焉，對操索葦。臘祭夕桃符

[①] [lěi]
["Guangyun" force the track, the purpose, come. ]
The traditional characters of "Lei 2". Also known as "蘲1".
(1) Military walls, fortifications on positions.
(2) Refers to military camps.
(3) Stacking.
(4) Mountains; mounds.
(5) Erected.
(6) Nest; nest.
(7) Constellation name. That is, the barriers.
(8) Last name. "Hou Zhao Lu" has Lei Cheng, whose surname is Pei. See "Guangyun·Shangzhi".
[②]［léi］
["Ji Yun" Lun chase after cutting, Pingzhi, come. ]

(1) Huge.
(2) The appearance of overlapping accumulation. See "Base 2 Base".
(3) Through "tired". Tied up.

[Guang Yun] Force track cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Lu Shui cut,? Yin Ming. [Said the text] Military base also. 【Li·Chu Li】There are many bases in the four suburbs, which is a shame to Doctor Qing. [Zhou Li·Xiaguan] Measure the base of the camp army, and measure the place of the Tujunshe in Chaozhou.　Also star name. 【Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials】Xunan all stars say Yulin Heavenly Army, and the west of the army is the base.　Also official name. [Previous Han·Baiguan Gongqing Form] Emperor Wu Ping Nanyue, added seven schools inside, and hit one of them.　The last name is Zhao Leicheng, the prefect of Jinzitong Leixi.　 [Ji Yun] Gen Fei cut. Mountain appearance.　You Lun chased, the sound was tired. Fear the base, the name of the mountain. 【Zhuangzi·Gengsangchu】Beijing is the mountain of Wei Lei. And Yulei Mountain, in the west of Guanxian County, Tang Zhenguan set aside about it. [Cen Shenshi] Yulei looks clear at the sky, and the peaks feel low.　Heavy again. One is strong appearance. [Previous Han·Bao Propaganda] A man of Quebec.　Zuka Xiangji also. [Zhang Zai·Seven Ai] He Lei Lei in Beimang.　The same as tired again. 【Xunzi·Overview】Don’t worry about it.　It's the same again.
